response.output: {{if(parameters.returnArrayAsOptionsRPC, convertFieldsToOptions(extractFormFields(body, parameters.shouldReturnArray, parameters.trigger)), extractFormFields(body, parameters.shouldReturnArray, parameters.trigger, parameters.update)}}

rpcViewRecordsInReport.name: rpcViewRecordsInReport
rpcViewRecordsInReport.label: View Records in Report

addRecord.name: addRecord
addRecord.label: Add a Record
addRecord.description:
Adds a new record to the selected application form.
Only the owner of the application can add a record to a private Form.
Anyone with a valid authtoken can add a record to a public Form.
Any user with a valid authtoken and share permission can add a record to a shared Form.

editRecords.name: editRecords
editRecords.label: Edit Records

nested.help:
Zoho Creator currently supports only AND rules.
To make sure, that you are editing the exact record that you want to edit, use as many filters as possible.
nested.name: criteria
nested.label: Criteria

editRecords.description: Edit records that match the selected criteria.

listFormsInApplication.name: listFormsInApplication
listFormsInApplication.label: Lists Forms in Application

expect.help: Maximum number of records returned in a single request to server.
expect.name: limit
expect.label: Limit

listFormsInApplication.description:
Lists all forms in the selected application.
Only the owner can see the list of forms in an application.
listFormsInApplication.expectJsonc:
[
    {
        "name": "appName",
        "type": "select",
        "label": "Application Name",
        "options": "rpc://app%23zoho-creator@1/rpcListApplications",
        "editable": true,
        "required": true
    },
    {
        "help": "Maximum number of records returned in a single request to server.",
        "name": "limit",
        "type": "uinteger",
        "label": "Limit",
        "default": 2
    }
]
